gw.plugin.productmodel

Interface IReferenceDatePlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IReferenceDatePlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Plugin interface for an external system to configure reference and availability date behavior.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Date getConditionReferenceDate(ConditionPattern conditionPattern, Coverable coverable) 
      java.util.Date getCoverageReferenceDate(CoveragePattern coveragePattern, Coverable coverable) 
      java.util.Date getExclusionReferenceDate(ExclusionPattern exclusionPattern, Coverable coverable) 
      java.util.Date getModifierReferenceDate(ModifierPatternBase modifierPattern, Modifiable modifiable) 
      java.util.Date getPeriodReferenceDate(PolicyPeriod period, ReferenceDateType dateType, Jurisdiction state)
      Returns a date that will be used as the reference date for effective dating.
      ReferenceDateType getReferenceDateType(PolicyLine policyLine, Jurisdiction jurisdiction) 
      ReferenceDateType getReferenceDateType(PolicyPeriod period, Jurisdiction jurisdiction) 
      ReferenceDateType getReferenceDateType(Product product, UWCompany uwCompany, Jurisdiction jurisdiction)
      This method is used for calculating the availability of a product, such as for new submissions.
      void reset()
      Resets any state information the plugin uses.

    • Method Detail

      • getReferenceDateType

        ReferenceDateType getReferenceDateType(PolicyLine policyLine,
                                       Jurisdiction jurisdiction)
        Parameters:
        policyLine - The policy line
        jurisdiction - The jurisdiction
        Returns:
        The type of reference date to use for the given policy line and jurisdiction.

      • getReferenceDateType

        ReferenceDateType getReferenceDateType(PolicyPeriod period,
                                       Jurisdiction jurisdiction)
        Parameters:
        period - The policy period
        jurisdiction - The jurisdiction
        Returns:
        The type of reference date to use for the given policy and jurisdiction.

      • getReferenceDateType

        ReferenceDateType getReferenceDateType(Product product,
                                       UWCompany uwCompany,
                                       Jurisdiction jurisdiction)
        This method is used for calculating the availability of a product, such as for new submissions. It must be treated differently since it exists outside the revisioning tree and there is little context to work from, e.g. no UWCompany to restrict on.
        Parameters:
        product - The product
        uwCompany - The underwriting company, if assigned
        jurisdiction - The jurisdiction
        Returns:
        The type of reference date to use for the given product and jurisdiction.

      • getCoverageReferenceDate

        java.util.Date getCoverageReferenceDate(CoveragePattern coveragePattern,
                                        Coverable coverable)
        Returns:
        The date to use for availability calculations for a given coverage pattern and coverable.

      • getExclusionReferenceDate

        java.util.Date getExclusionReferenceDate(ExclusionPattern exclusionPattern,
                                         Coverable coverable)
        Returns:
        The date to use for availability calculations for a given exclusion pattern and coverable.

      • getConditionReferenceDate

        java.util.Date getConditionReferenceDate(ConditionPattern conditionPattern,
                                         Coverable coverable)
        Returns:
        The date to use for availability calculations for a given condition pattern and coverable.

      • getModifierReferenceDate

        java.util.Date getModifierReferenceDate(ModifierPatternBase modifierPattern,
                                        Modifiable modifiable)
        Returns:
        The date to use for availability calculations for a given modifier pattern and modifiable.

      • getPeriodReferenceDate

        java.util.Date getPeriodReferenceDate(PolicyPeriod period,
                                      ReferenceDateType dateType,
                                      Jurisdiction state)
        Returns a date that will be used as the reference date for effective dating.
        Parameters:
        period - The policy period for which effective dating is needed
        dateType - The type of the reference date
        state - The state is which effective dating is needed
        Returns:
        The date used as reference for availability evaluation

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets any state information the plugin uses. In the default configuration, this should be called whenever the RefDateTypeLookup table changes in the server. This should only happen on deployment of system table changes from Studio to a live server.
